ack.title: Contributors
ack.p: RVB, HvR, AAS, SA, DP, JMB, and CC designed the trial. TTS, AS, and KKT did the data analyses. All authors contributed equally to results interpretation. RVB, AvH, SA, TS, and MLK wrote the first draft of the manuscript. All authors contributed equally to the execution of the trial and critically reviewed and approved the final manuscript.
